metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37453 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the USB subsystem in the Linux kernel through6.4.2. There is an out-of-bounds and crash in read_descriptors indrivers/usb/core/sysfs.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-37453` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.5.0-6.6
linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic-lpae - 6.5.0-6.6
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic - 6.5.0-6.6
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-20-generic-64k - 6.5.0-6.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.5.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.5.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 6.5.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-6.6').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1006.6').
linux-azure package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1005.5').
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1005.5').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1007.7').
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
